properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 7 at 4:11AM EST until February 7 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Albany NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Snow accumulations of 5 to 9
inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch.
Winds gusting as high as 50 mph resulting in blowing snow.

* WHERE...Northern Fulton County.

* WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Isolated to Scattered power outages and tree damage
are likely due to the ice. Travel will be hazardous.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches an hour are
possible late this morning into the afternoon with gusty winds.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING
